text: Merritt is a Canadian city in British Columbia, Canada. Marritt is in the south-central Interior of British Columbia and also in the Nicola Valley. As of 2021, Marritt had 7,051 people. The current mayor of Merritt is Michael Goetz. Merritt is home to a BCHL (British Columbia Hockey League) team called the Merritt Centennials which is the oldest ice hockey team in the league. In 2008, the Country Music Hall of Fame relocated from Calgary to Merritt. ==Other websites== *City of Merritt's Official website Category:Cities in British Columbia Category:Nicola Country
